mapper.select: select car_id, car_number, car_style, car_load, car_mileage, car_brand from CarInfo where car_id = #{carId}
select car_id, car_number, car_style, car_load, car_mileage, car_brand from pls.CarInfo
mapper.insert: insert into CarInfo(car_number, car_style, car_load, car_mileage, car_brand) values (#{carNumber}, #{carStyle}, #{carLoad}, #{carMileage}, #{carBrand})

insert into CarInfo(car_number, car_style, car_load, car_mileage, car_brand) values
(#{entity.carNumber}, #{entity.carStyle}, #{entity.carLoad}, #{entity.carMileage}, #{entity.carBrand})

insert into CarInfo(car_number, car_style, car_load, car_mileage, car_brand) values
(#{entity.carNumber}, #{entity.carStyle}, #{entity.carLoad}, #{entity.carMileage}, #{entity.carBrand})
on duplicate key update car_number = values(car_number), car_style = values(car_style), car_load = values(car_load), car_mileage = values(car_mileage), car_brand = values(car_brand)
mapper.update:
update CarInfo
car_number = #{carNumber},
car_style = #{carStyle},
car_load = #{carLoad},
car_mileage = #{carMileage},
car_brand = #{carBrand},
where car_id = #{carId}
